bibl.title: A New Reading in the Anonymus "Theaetetus" Commentary.
bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 9782 (= Pack2 1393) = C.P.F. III, 9. Ties the fr. D to the lemma 157c7-d2, between fr. A and fr. B.

bibl.title: Papiri filosofici. Miscellanea di Studi. I

bibl.seg: SEDLEY David, A New Reading in the Anonymus "Theaetetus" Commentary (PBerol. 9782 Fragment D).
Papiri filosofici. Miscellanea di Studi. I (Firenze, 1997) pp. 139-144.
P. Berol. Inv. 9782 (= Pack2 1393) = C.P.F. III, 9. Ties the fr. D to the lemma 157c7-d2, between fr. A and fr. B.
